title: Serif — Art Cinema
content:
Hello,  
wondering what this font is called?  
Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131003im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SHOTCINEM_5021.png)

Font: 

 Century Old Style 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131003/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Emma-L

comments.content: **[Century Old Style (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131003/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Monotype&ffam=Century%20OS%20MT%20Std%20-%20Bold&fid=d1271c49f0fdc8195439e22e124c6cbb&fsize=60&text=Art%20Cinema%20OFFoff%20Voorjaar%202014&wrap=2)** by Morris Fuller Benton (1906)
